text: Today on the West Coast, Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are working well with 7 ft @ 13s WNW swell and fresh 17 mph SW winds. Expect clean conditions early, especially around the tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 9s WSW with strong 39 mph S winds, making it poor for surfing. The day after, the swell picks up to 11 ft @ 15s W but remains blown out by 27 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
